name: Scenario_PreAlpha_Minefield_A
journelText: Andy-My plan worked perfectly. We lured my brainless foes into the minefield and was rewarded as they preceded to blunder into every single mine. Though there were no mines left by the end I could still cackle with glee at the results of my tactical masterstroke. Afterward I took a moment to siphon what dark energy I could from the shower of limps gently raining down around us before we turned away and headed onwards. [PAGE BREAK][BUTTON](EXIT){Move on} [EFFECT](ADD_ENERGY){50}
